title: AI Integration Opportunities for Noted App

overview.description: Comprehensive plan for integrating AI capabilities into the Noted app to enhance user experience, reduce manual effort, and provide intelligent features for note management and discovery.

currentStack.notes: Cross-platform mobile/web app with folders, themes, offline support
